arts.ttl: Man Utd transfer news: Ruben Amorim sends Rasmus Hojlund warning after Arsenal snub

arts.ttl: How Bayindir lost the physical battle on Arsenal goal
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundit Joe Hart explains how Mason Mount could have protected goalkeeper Altair Bayindir from the pressure of William Saliba during the corner which led to Arsenal's goal in Manchester United's 1-0 defeat at Old Trafford.

A usual performance that you get from the Manchester United captain, but playing deeper, he struggled to create real problems for the Arsenal backline. Didn't do a lot wrong defensively and tried to help with build-up play, and continues to become a mainstay in the Manchester United defence for years to come.

arts.ttl: "Massive Win" Mikel Arteta reacts to opening game victory against Manchester United
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta spoke to the media following the conclusion of Arsenal's 1-0 victory over Manchester United at Old Trafford. Arteta appeared pleased with his team's performance in the season opener, stating that when his side made mistakes, they responded to them in the correct manner.

arts.ttl: Roy Keane asks Mikel Arteta pointed question despite Arsenal win over Man Utd
arts.sum: Arsenal beat Manchester United in their first Premier League match of the new season but pundit Roy Keane still felt last season's runners-up have questions to answer
